excerpt: "Rani Hamza, a sophomore aiming to finish Hamline in three years and then go to law school, said he's been using ChatGPT since early in the year for help when he has to write a paper or essay. \"I struggle a lot beginning a paper,\" he said. \"I'll put in a topic [in ChatGPT] and read what it says to get a start.\""
